mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "From the Floor", "Square Dance Date Book", "On the Record and Record Report", "As I See It, by Bob Osgood", "12th National Square Dance Convention", "Overseas Dateline", "The Dancer's Walkthru", "Ladies, Here's Your Partner's View of You", "Vox Saltator: The Square Dancer Speaks Up", "Style Series: Some Bits and Pieces", "Homes for Square Dancing", "'Round the Outside Ring", "Workshop", "The Caller of the Month: Wayne Slocum", "Paging the Roundancers: Charlie and Perkie Tucker", "Current Best Sellers: Record Sales Survey", "What Are They Wearing?", and "Experimental Lab-Turn and Deal"
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
